p: In the second stage of the experiment, minimum inhibitory concentration (MIC), minimum fungicidal concentration (MFC) and minimum sporicidal concentration (MSC) values of the four essential oils which showed inhibition haloes greater than that of nystatin (the positive control), i.e., with a minimum halo diameter > 20 mm, were determined using the microdilution method based on standard CLSI (2008) guidelines [ 34] with minor modifications.
